Room.Name: Neilian Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Neilian Drive, south of the Ministry of Rumor Control.
Room.LongDescription: The North Oceancrest Ministries are located on the north part of the street, providing order and wisdom for the city. The Ministry of Rumor Control is one of the more interesting bodies in city politics, and is responsible for detailed information about events which happen in the city. This is kind of like the media, except slightly better.
